claim: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah is produced by Neela Tele Films Private Limited and has run a long time.

supporting.text: The official website of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah explicitly mentions Neela Tele Films Private Limited as its production company.

attacks.text: The official website of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah explicitly mentions Neela Tele Films Private Limited as its production company.
The official website of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah may not be regularly updated, so its information about the production company could be outdated.
The production company listed on the official website might be incorrect due to potential errors or deliberate misinformation.
The official website is maintained by Neela Tele Films Private Limited itself and therefore ensures accurate and up-to-date information about its productions.
Official websites of popular TV shows are typically verified through multiple channels (e.g., media reports or legal documents), reducing chances of misinformation.
Even if maintained by Neela Tele Films Private Limited, internal errors or mismanagement could lead to incorrect data being published on their website.
Verification through external channels does not guarantee accuracy; media reports might also contain errors or biases regarding production credits.

supporting.text: Multiple credible media outlets and entertainment databases list Neela Tele Films as the producer of the show since its inception in 2008.

attacks.text: Multiple credible media outlets and entertainment databases list Neela Tele Films as the producer of the show since its inception in 2008.
Some media outlets may have outdated or incorrect information about the production company.
The show might have had a different producer before 2008, and Neela Tele Films only took over later.
There is no official documentation from Neela Tele Films confirming their role as the producer of the show.
Credible media outlets are generally reliable and undergo fact-checking processes.
Industry records show consistent production by Neela Tele Films without any documented changes.
Broadcasting authorities maintain official records confirming Neela Tele Films’ production role.

supporting.text: The series has maintained continuous airtime on Sony TV for over 15 years, demonstrating its prolonged runtime and popularity.

attacks.text: The series has maintained continuous airtime on Sony TV for over 15 years, demonstrating its prolonged runtime and popularity.
The show was not produced by Neela Tele Films Private Limited but by Balaji Telefilms Limited instead.
The series experienced multiple hiatuses and reboots between 2008 and 2023, making its actual continuous airtime less than 15 years.
Popularity metrics do not correlate with runtime duration; other shows with shorter runs can also be popular.
Balaji Telefilms Limited is a subsidiary of Neela Tele Films Private Limited, so production responsibility remains valid.
The hiatuses mentioned in B2 were brief and do not negate the overall 15-year span of original airings.
Runtime duration is independently verifiable through official episode counts and broadcast records, separate from popularity.
Balaji Telefilms Limited operates as a separate legal entity from Neela Tele Films Private Limited per corporate filings.
Broadcast records show a three-month gap in original episodes between 2015-2016, contradicting C2's claim.
Official episode logs from Sony TV confirm only 12 years of uninterrupted original broadcasts for the series.

supporting.text: Neela Tele Films Private Limited is not registered as a production entity for Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah in official broadcasting records.

attacks.text: Neela Tele Films Private Limited is not registered as a production entity for Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah in official broadcasting records.
Official broadcasting records explicitly list Neela Tele Films Private Limited as the producer of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah.
The show's production history shows continuous association with Neela Tele Films Private Limited since its inception in 2008.
Multiple credible media sources confirm Neela Tele Films Private Limited as the production house for Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah.
The so-called 'official broadcasting records' referenced in B1 are outdated and not maintained by authorized regulatory bodies.
Production history data cited in B2 lacks verifiable timestamps or contractual documentation from Neela Tele Films.
Media sources mentioned in B3 are biased towards entertainment industry narratives and not authoritative verification.
Regulatory bodies responsible for broadcasting records do not maintain public digital archives for verification purposes.
The absence of timestamps in B2's claim does not invalidate the long-term operational continuity of Neela Tele Films.
Media coverage bias does not negate the factual existence of Neela Tele Films' production role for the show.
Digital archives are unnecessary for verifying production registrations when physical documentation exists.
Operational continuity can be proven through internal company records rather than public timestamps.

attacks.text\": Entertainment industry narratives can still represent objective industry standards for production credits.

supporting.text: The show was reportedly discontinued in 2020 due to low viewership ratings after a decade-long run on Sony TV.

attacks.text: The show was reportedly discontinued in 2020 due to low viewership ratings after a decade-long run on Sony TV.
The show continues to air on other platforms beyond Sony TV, contradicting the claim of discontinuation.
Viewership ratings for Taarak Mehta are consistently high, refuting the low ratings assertion.
The show has been on Sony TV for over 15 years, not just a decade, indicating a longer run than stated.
There is no credible evidence of the show airing on other platforms post-2020; sources confirm its discontinuation.
Independent rating agencies report a decline in viewership after 2018, supporting the low ratings claim.
Official records from Sony TV show the show aired from 2008 to 2018, exactly a decade, validating Ai's timeline.
Multiple fan groups and social media platforms indicate ongoing episodes post-2020 despite official statements.
The decline in viewership after 2018 is attributed to seasonal fluctuations, not a consistent low rating.
The 2008-2018 timeline is disputed by industry insiders who mention earlier start dates.

supporting.text: Ekta Kapoor’s Balaji Telefilms is widely recognized as the true producer of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah in industry reports.

attacks.text: Ekta Kapoor’s Balaji Telefilms is widely recognized as the true producer of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah in industry reports.
The claim explicitly states Neela Tele Films Private Limited as the producer, not Balaji Telefilms, making A6 contradictory to the original assertion.
Official records from the Indian Television Authority list Neela Tele Films Private Limited as the registered producer of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah.
Industry reports cited in A6 may reflect outdated information or misattribution, as Balaji Telefilms has historically partnered with Neela Tele Films on multiple projects.
The Indian Television Authority’s records could be subject to errors or changes in registration details over time, undermining B2’s reliability.
Balaji Telefilms’ industry recognition does not inherently invalidate Neela Tele Films’ legal registration as the producer under Indian law.
B2’s reliance on official records assumes their infallibility, but regulatory databases often contain inconsistencies or unverified entries.
